https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/h3KW0LHPJJHwXB6CVyLTXFTwxj4.jpg Various parties and different motives all intersect at an inn on the eve of closure; at the center of everything is an elusive and enigmatic bandit. A band of mine robbers, a thief and some Japanese soldiers all set out to find a lucrative gold mine, unaware that they're heading right into a trap. A Mysterious Robber
